title: TableTalk: Scaffolding Spreadsheet Development with a Language Agent
description: We use language agents to interactively collaborate with spreadsheet programmers, which helps them create better spreadsheets.

title: Interpreting Hate Speech Classifiers: Does Dataset Label Space Matter?
description: We use artificial intelligence interpretability methods to understand how hate speech classifiers make decisions and whether the dataset label space influences such decisions.

title: Visual COMET: Visual Commonsense Reasoning in Time
description: I developed a research demo for Visual COMET to make visual commonsense inferences on images for events before, during, and after the image.
